channel.title: I get this odd Error in runserver.bat
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1956) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29) Starting 1337scape V2 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
I am not sure what that's about.
Any help?

item.title: I get this odd Error in runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

The problem is that npchandler.java cannot load npc.cfg because of an error within it.
It’s your npc.cfg.

EDIT: Oh, ok, lol.

Read full topic
item.source: I get this odd Error in runserver.bat

item.title: I get this odd Error in runserver.bat

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Yep, I fixed it.

And it’s npc.cfg lol
